New Records: Zaccharie Risacher scored a career-high 33 points, the most by a rookie this season.
The Atlanta Hawks secured a significant victory after a strong comeback, highlighting their defensive and offensive capabilities.
Key Match Events: The Hawks mounted a 13-1 run in the final minutes to secure the win.
Clint Capela capped a 9-1 run with a fast-break dunk with 46.9 seconds remaining to give the Hawks a 114-111 lead.
Post-Match Reflections: The Atlanta Hawks bounced back from a previous poor performance with one of their best efforts of the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks entered the game as the league's best 3-point shooting team but struggled to maintain that performance.
The game was played in front of a healthy contingent of Knicks fans in Atlanta.
Others: The game marked the 100th meeting between the Atlanta Hawks and New York Knicks.
The Atlanta Hawks will face the Detroit Pistons in their next game.
